CustomField.description: This is going to decide how many Users or PayoutResults to process per commission statement batch. This is implemented to fix Apex CPU Timeout Limit Exception. Set the value to "0" if you don't want to use the feature and process all the records at once.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is going to decide how many Users or PayoutResults to process per commission statement batch. Set the value to "0" if you don't want to use the feature and process all the records at once. Don't set negatives
CustomField.label: CommStmtUserBreakup
